summary: Enhances Dawnbreakers Damage to Daedric Sword level, and allows it to be Tempered fully also removed the enchantments "cost" so it never runs out
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]With the release of Twins of Meridia I now consider this mod Obsolete, Twins has the same improvments as this one.[/size]





**PestiX also has a mod done in German http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19334 His mod was out before mine, so take alook at it first the only difference between ours is, the enchantment being unlimited or not**

Uploading this per a request from a friend,and also for others who like the sword but maybe not the hassle of carrying a bunch of soul stones with you,or the lack luster performance at high levels,esspecially on master difficulty.

And if your like me, who likes to use just one sword for your entire "career" that looks cool,this might be for you to.

Mainly this mod does just a few simple things, nothing fancy really.

1: Increases Dawnbreakers damage to Daedric Sword level (it IS a Daedric articfact after all)

2: Lets you improve it at the grinding stone fully (To Legendary quality),It will still take the Arcane Blacksmith perk as it is enchanted.

3: Removes the Enchantment's "cost" basically so it will never need to be recharged.

Installation: Just unzip it and add it to your Data folder like any other mod (manual download only)

Recommended Mods: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2518 I personally like this one for dawnbreaker the runes add flavor to it
author: Direwolf34
